Trigger.name: There are some tracks of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.

regexCodeList.string: (^There are some tracks of an? (.+) leaving (.+)\.$)

Trigger.name: Some (.+) tracks of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
Some (.+) tracks of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
Some (.+) bloody traces of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
Some (.+) bloody traces of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
(.+) leaves (.+)\.
Trigger.script:
local dir = matches[3]:split(" ")[1]
local directions = {north = "^^", east = ">>", south = "vv", west = "<<", up = "uu", down = "dd"} if directions[dir] then cecho(f" {directions[dir]}") end
